title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-3.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-3.1 - General

State Regulations

All expenditures made by a local agency are subject to
audit and review by the division before being admitted as charges to project
revenue or to funds (in the form of loans or subsidies) advanced or to be
advanced by the State. Expenditures not admitted are termed ineligible
expenditures. Before incurring expenditures, local agencies should
predetermine, as far as possible, their eligibility as development costs or
operation expenses, in order to avoid the necessity of making adjustments at a
later date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1640-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
